name: MySocialMediaAssistant
0:
”Alexa, Open my social media assistant”
”Alexa, Ask my social media assistant to update my status”
”Alexa, Ask my social media assistant to find me an article”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my social media assistant
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Share highly relevant news across your team's social media to ensure you are experts in your industry!

Connects easily to your Buffer or HootSuite account.

You must have an active ContentApp account for this to work.

see: https://contentapp.ai
